title: Need help with fonts
content:
Hi everybody,

This is my first post and I hope someone can help me.

I am trying to identify the 2(?) fonts used in this image.

Many thanks for your support!

IS

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905135646im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_4874.gif)

 [‹ (x) Days of Awe / The Sephardic Heritage Haggadah book covers - Bradley, Solemnis {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905135646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41755 "Go to previous forum topic") [owp/p logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905135646/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41759 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Kalendermacher

comments.content:
The smaller lettering might be DIN Bold. At first I thought the CAFFE MILANO lettering was customized DIN, but I doubt it.

- Mike Yanega
